title: Pyramid top

properties.name: description
properties.value: The pyramid top is an artefact found at the top of the Agility Pyramid course. To obtain it, players have to go through a series of obstacles to reach the top. Once at the highest point on the pyramid, the pyramid top can be seen above the exit doorway. To reach it, climb the climbing rocks at the side of the doorway. Then proceed around the top level and you will arrive at the centre of the south face of the pyramid.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Pyramid top
Pyramid top
Released16 January 2006 (Update)
MembersYes
Quest itemNo

ExamineIt's a solid gold pyramid!

Advanced data
Item ID6970

The pyramid top is an artefact found at the top of the Agility Pyramid course. To obtain it, players have to go through a series of obstacles to reach the top. Once at the highest point on the pyramid, the pyramid top can be seen above the exit doorway. To reach it, climb the climbing rocks at the side of the doorway. Then proceed around the top level and you will arrive at the centre of the south face of the pyramid.

A player grabbing the top.

Since the pyramid is situated in the Kharidian Desert, players will be affected by the desert heat, thus bringing waterskins is recommended.

Simon Templeton will buy pyramid tops from the player for 10,000 coins each. Using them on Simon will allow you to sell them faster.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
11 February 2016
(update | poll)

Pyramid tops can now be exchanged for 10,000 coins each, up from 1,000 coins.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The item seems to have the Eye of Horus on it.

[[File:Pyramid top detail.png|left|120px]]
The '''pyramid top''' is an artefact found at the top of the [[Agility Pyramid]] course. To obtain it, players have to go through a series of obstacles to reach the top. Once at the highest point on the pyramid, the pyramid top can be seen above the exit doorway. To reach it, climb the climbing rocks at the side of the doorway. Then proceed around the top level and you will arrive at the centre of the south face of the pyramid.

[[File:Obtaining pyramid top.gif|frame|left|A player grabbing the top.]]
Since the pyramid is situated in the [[Kharidian Desert]], players will be affected by the [[desert heat]], thus bringing [[waterskin]]s is recommended.

[[Simon Templeton]] will buy pyramid tops from the player for 10,000 coins each. Using them on Simon will allow you to sell them faster.
